title: Charming Condo in Poncey-Highland
address: 616 N Highland Ave NE #3A, Atlanta, GA 30306
description: This charming condo is located in the desirable neighborhood of Poncey-Highland in Atlanta. It features a sunlit living room, a large sunroom with views of N. Highland, hardwood floors, and a spacious bedroom. The location is unbeatable, just steps away from Ponce City Market, the Beltline, Little Five Points, and Virginia-Highland. This pet-friendly property allows dogs under 25lbs with a pet deposit.

importantInformation.viewings: Contact the property manager to schedule a viewing.
